feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
